title: How to setup dbt UI for data lineage?
question_body: I'm new to the dbt and I'm planning to use dbt cli. One question is how to setup the dbt ui and have such a data lineage graph? I didn't find how to do it here with cli https://docs.getdbt.com/tutorial/create-a-project-dbt-cli.
answer_body:
dbt docs might be what you're looking for?

You need to first generate the docs using:

dbt docs generate

Then, serve them:

dbt docs serve

You'll find that the docs are served locally. Once you open the link in a browser you can see the lineage at the bottom right like so:

There is more detail here: https://docs.getdbt.com/reference/commands/cmd-docs
